document.full_text: the dow and s&p 500 closed out their fourth week of losses with a small gain on friday, but only with the help of a weaker dollar boosting metals prices and basic materials stocks.
document.title: material world lifts stocks; dow, s&p off for fourth week
lines_and_colors: the dow and s&p 500 closed out their fourth week of losses with a small gain on friday, but only with the help of a weaker dollar boosting metals prices and basic materials stocks.
